units.title: Lentiviral transduction of hiPSCs
units.text: hiPSCs were transduced with a lentiviral vector encoding FLP under the control of the CDH1 promoter at day 15 before analysis at day 24.
units.rationale: Describes the gene delivery step required for lineage tracing.

units.title: Immunostaining of infected organoids
units.text: Images of immunostaining for the HA tag, the CM marker cTnT and the mesenchymal marker vimentin (top) or the HA tag, vimentin and the SMC marker calponin (CNN1; bottom) in infected organoids at day 24; n = 26 epicardioids of the paths taken by cells within the epicardial subclustering.
units.rationale: Details the antibody staining protocol used to visualize cell-type markers.

units.title: Generation of epicardioids from reporter hiPSCs
units.text:
Epicardioids differentiated from AAVS1‑FRT‑flanked STOP‑mKate2‑HA reporter hiPSCs.
we treated 1‑month‑old epicardioids with endothelin‑1 (ET1), a potent vasoconstrictor known to induce dose‑dependent up‑regulation of myocytic hypertrophy markers (NPPA, NPPB, ACTA1 and MYH7/MYH6) and an increase in CM size (Fig. 6a,b).
units.rationale: Specifies the starting cell line and genetic construct for epicardoid formation.

units.title: Calcium imaging with Fluo‑4
units.text: Exemplary Fluo‑4 traces in treated and control epicardioids. Blue arrows indicate 0.5‑Hz pacing, and red arrows indicate arrhythmic events.
units.rationale: Describes functional assessment of calcium handling in the organoids.

units.title: Immunostaining for fibrosis markers in Noonan syndrome organoids
units.text:
Immunostaining for cTnT and FN1 in control and Noonan syndrome organoids (day 15).
CM area; n = 260 CMs from 3 differentiations per group. Data were analyzed by unpaired two‑tailed t‑test.
units.rationale: Shows the staining protocol used to compare extracellular matrix deposition.

units.title: Replication of experiments
units.text:
Three independent differentiations per group were performed.
Data were analyzed by one‑way ANOVA with a Sidak’s multiple comparisons test.
Data were analyzed by Kruskal–Wallis test with a Dunn’s multiple comparisons test.
units.rationale: Indicates the number of biological replicates for robustness.
